      • modify

        public GBASprite.Creator modify()
        Modify this GBASprite. This returns a Creator which modifies the current sprite. The sprite returned from the creator is an all-new sprite built from this one.
        Returns:
        A creator to modify this sprite.

      • create

        public static GBASprite.Creator create(BitDepth bitDepth,
                                       SpriteSize spriteSize)
        Create a GBASprite. Returns a Creator for creating a sprite at the specified bitDepth and spriteSize.
        Parameters:
        bitDepth - The bit depth to create the image at.
        spriteSize - The sprite size to use.
        Returns:
        A creator to create a Sprite.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - bitDepth or spriteSize is null.

      • getHexer

        public static Hexer<GBASprite> getHexer(BitDepth bitDepth,
                                        SpriteSize spriteSize)
        Get a hexer that writes GBA Sprites
        Parameters:
        bitDepth - The bit depth to use.
        spriteSize - The sprite size to read.
        Returns:
        The created Hexer
